description: We are sending excessively large messages to the compute node when we do a multiple boot with a large number of instances.
title: The entire list of scheduled instances is passed to the compute node.

comments.content: We are sending excessively large messages to the compute node when we do a multiple boot with a large number of instances.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/20349
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/20349
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/12c11e0a37a8e59adfa0a73bc4f8f95a397b7bbf
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 12c11e0a37a8e59adfa0a73bc4f8f95a397b7bbf
Author: Vishvananda Ishaya <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jan 23 12:23:06 2013 -0800

    Don't pass the entire list of instances to compute
    
    We don't need to pass the entire (potentially large) list of instances
    down to the compute node. This will save potentially thousands of
    bytes in the message.
    
    Fixes bug 1103669
    
    Change-Id: Ia90a19dffa90575a0f02191603ae9e96ca9258df
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
